AppString > AppStringDoc

Compile

The code was compiled using GNU GCC 4.3.2 and makefiles are provided for each module.

A global makefile for the entire package is provided in the root of the source directory, src. Please edit makefile.ini in the root of the source directory and set CODEBASEROOT to the absolute path of the source code directory.

e.g., if you put the code in /home/joe/flamingo-3.0/src do:

CODEBASEROOT = /home/joe/flamingo-3.0/src

To compile all packages please run make in the root of the source directory. To compile each module, please run make inside the corresponding module directory.

Please note that for the mattree module, there is no makefile provided, only a Visual C++ project file is provided. This module has not been compiled using GCC.
